data: GYN Post Operative Pain and Symptom Management
Do not initiate this powerplan if Anesthesia is following the patient
Order for Duplicate Checking, do not modify

dose range: 1 to 3 mg, IV, q1h, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj

For Enhanced Recovery After Surgery Patient, use the following two ondansetron orders
4mg, IV, q8h, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: inj
4 to 8 mg, IV, q8h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
If Pasero sedation score greater than 2 and / or respiratory rate is 8/min or less, stop all opioids and IMMEDATELY page Prescribing Provider
